text: [[col:yellow]]Experimental Study[[/col]]||Select any ingredient to reveal its location.\\n\\nTo retrieve ingredients, their locations must be occupied or controlled via military alliances. Once both ingredients have been collected it can be used to conduct experiements

Arbaal unleashes his fury and slaughters his foes with reckless abandon. He gains a surge of energy and can move again on the campaign map. However, this also drains some of his bloodlust and reduces his favor with Khorne.
